note: In re 1662 McKay Exhibit A Lichtenberg Judge 8 May /91
Filed Jan 89 1894 W.B. Spencer By W.P.M. Bade Deputy Clerk
p: A couple of years ago Alice McKay made application for a writ of Habeas Corpus for the body of her child Mary McKay She deposited with the clerk certain monies for the payment of cost of the money is still in the hands of the clerk & due her. The clerk will pay it over to her upon your order. Will you kindly intrust the to pay it over to her. Ronald & Piles
